verbs.description: A sequence of contradictory statements about lawyer Michael Cohen 's $ 130,000 payment of hush money to [V: porn] star Stormy Daniels before the 2016 election demonstrates a pattern of false statements by Donald Trump , Cohen and spokeswomen for the president .

[ARG0: A sequence of contradictory statements about lawyer Michael Cohen 's $ 130,000 payment of hush money to porn star Stormy Daniels before the 2016 election] [V: demonstrates] [ARG1: a pattern of false statements by Donald Trump , Cohen and spokeswomen for the president] .
